TopicTitle: Crew tweak when selecting a ship

Articles.Content:
Hello!

Would be nice if when you go to launch a rocket the game never auto suggests a pilot for you. At the very least it would awesome if this was a toggleable option.

I have two reasons for this thought. Firstly, I like to launch unmanned rockets, and sometimes after a dozen or so launches in a row I will slip up and send a homie into space without proper return attire. 

My fault. I realize that.

But the second thing is the game always decides to auto-send Jeb into space. And damnit I like Jeb. I'd rather send anybody else! I only send Jeb up on a proven safe rocket for space station victory high fives. And even then sometimes I kill him.

Thanks for the brilliant game, I'm still playing it non-stop since I bought it!

-Newblar
I agree - it's way too easy to forget to properly crew your ship. I'd love an option to add it as a mandatory step before launch.

I'm guilty of it as well, but I have done it so much I've basically beat it into my brain to check the crew to suit my particular mission. I think it just takes some dedication in its current state, but some mandatory step to crew your ship sounds like an interesting option.
